DTable

Represents a table compound by different kind of cells

new DTable()
Instance Members
▸ drawAllTable(data)

Returns the table represented as a string.

drawAllTable(data: Array<Object>): String
Parameters
data (Array<Object>) Data of the table.
Returns
String: Table represented as a string.
▸ drawTable(rows)

Returns the table represented as a string.

drawTable(rows: any): String
Parameters
rows (any)
Returns
String: Table represented as a string.
▸ dataTable(data)

Initializes the content of the table.

dataTable(data: Array<Object>)
Parameters
data (Array<Object>) Initial data.
▸ rowHeights(rows)

Returns the minimum number of rows needed by the table to represent it's data.

rowHeights(rows: Array<String>): Number
Parameters
rows (Array<String>) Data.
Returns
Number: Rows needed.
▸ colWidths(rows)

Returns the minimum number of rows needed by the table to represent it's data.

colWidths(rows: Array<String>): Number
Parameters
rows (Array<String>) Data.
Returns
Number: Columns needed.

InheritedStretchCell

Represents a table cell which wraps another. It's the same kind of cell that StretchCell but it's implementation is slightly different.

new InheritedStretchCell(text: String, width: Number, height: Number)

Extends TCell

Parameters
text (String) Content of the wrapped cell.
width (Number) Width of the InheritedStretchCell.
height (Number) Height of the InheritedStretchCell.
Instance Members
▸ minWidth()

Returns the width of the cell.

minWidth(): Number
Returns
Number: Width.
▸ minHeight()

Returns the height of the cell.

minHeight(): Number
Returns
Number: Height.
▸ draw(width, height)

Returns a string representing this cell with the given width and height.

draw(width: Number, height: Number): String
Parameters
width (Number) Width of the cell to be drawn.
height (Number) Height of the cell to be drawn.
Returns
String: Cell represented as a String.

RCell

Represents a table cell which content is right-aligned

new RCell(text: String)

Extends TCell

Parameters
text (String) Content of the new cell.
Instance Members
▸ draw(width, height)

TCell

Represents a table cell which content is left-aligned

new TCell(text: String)
Parameters
text (String) Content of the new cell.
Instance Members
▸ draw(width, height)

Returns a string representing this cell with the given width and height.

Parameters
width (Number) Width of the cell to be drawn.
height (Number) Height of the cell to be drawn.
Returns
String: Cell represented as a String.
▸ getContent(width, height)

Returns an Array of String compound by the text given to the constructor.

getContent(width: Number, height: Number): Array<String>
Parameters
width (Number) Width of each String of the Array returned.
height (Number) Amount of Strings stored in the Array returned.
Returns
Array<String>: Array containing the strings.

UnderlinedCell

Represents a table cell which content is left-aligned and underlined

new UnderlinedCell(inner: any, text: String)

Extends TCell

text (String) Content of the new cell.
